definition: without payment, a person who performs voluntary work, tell voluntarily
details:
adjective
- without payment
= synonyms: gratis
noun
- a person who performs voluntary work
= synonyms: unpaid worker
- (military) a person who freely enlists for service
= synonyms: voluntary
verb
- tell voluntarily
= example: tell voluntarily
- do volunteer work
- agree freely
= example: agree freely
= synonyms: offer
